pages.text: The $(item)Divining Rod$() is one of the most basic $(thing)Artificing$() works that a novice artisan will have to undertake.$(br2)This piece of dust on a stick, when held underground in the off-hand, will start shining when it locates $(l:intro/cinnabar)Cinnabar$(), an essential resource to further one's $(thing)Alchemical Artisanship$() career.

$(item)Cinnabar Ore$() is what we like to call a "$(thing)Hidden Ore$()". As the name implies, the ore isn't visible to the naked eye, and as such requires a tool like a $(item)Divining Rod$() to locate.$(br2)$(item)Cinnabar Ore$() is located in roughly the same height as $(item)Gold Ore$(). The rod will alert you to its presence, just look around after that to find it.
The $(item)Divining Rod$() is relatively easy to construct, requiring only a few $(item)Sticks$() and a speck of $(item)Alchemical Ash$().
